knimeNode.name: SOTA Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts classes for rows using the input SOTA model.

fullDescription.intro: Predicts a class for each row of the input data table. The class value is a string and the values to predict the class for have to be double values. The SOTA Predictor can only be used with an input SOTA model, that used the class column during the training phase.

ports.dataIn: Datatable containing the data to predict its classes.
ports.dataOut: Datatable containing the input data and the predicted classes.

modelIn.name: The model of the trained SOTA

ports.modelIn: The model of the trained SOTA.
